name: Let It Go - How to realize your dreams
name_original: Let It Go - How to realize your dreams
description:
Let It Go is a first person puzzle game. Play as a tormented soul on a deserted island, and solve the puzzles to find out what is preventing you from living your dream. But beware, the Venerable Meow-Meow offers you only 21 seconds on his island! Fortunately there are ways to increase your game time...

What is the secret to go live your dreams?


A playful experience of personal development, with a real treasure revealed, at least to those who will be able to pass the tests?

Time belongs to you


An extraordinary power that will allow you to play with the events of the island.

Make offerings to the Venerable Meow-Meow


There are bottles of heavenly milk hidden on the island... find them, and the Venerable Miou-Miou will reward you with more time to explore his island and solve the riddles.

A short life span

Your time is precious, that's why Let It Go is a short and deep experience (1 hour of play on average for a first game.) We want a majority of players to be able to finish Let It Go and get the secret to go live their dreams.

Speedrun mode

Let It Go is a game where you will learn how the island works by heart. After completing the game, you will unlock a speedrun mode with a brand new soundtrack, with no possibility to return to the Meow-Meow Hub!
